objective: Working on a fast-paced, challenging team to push the boundaries of the cloud world to its limits, and put a harness on the chaos. I hope to help deliver the dream of ambient intelligence to the world.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
dutiesAndAccomplishments: Designed end to end business automation solutions.
Created custom MediaWiki private deployment, with low maintenance and high automation, eliminating legacy documentation systems and headcount.
Reduced headcount with self-service automation engine.
Drove DevOps culture across organization, increasing resiliency of live site products.
Created self Service team engagement application, elminating the need for engineering hours.
Developed rapid solutions using Azure to enable GTM strategies to be piloted quickly.
